dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will methodically break down complex issues into manageable parts, analyzing data and evidence.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to guide their problem-solving approach, often trusting gut feelings.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assert themselves firmly and confidently, using direct confrontation to resolve disputes.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground and work towards mutually beneficial solutions, prioritizing cooperation over competition.

dimensions.label: Technical Comfort Level
dimensions.description: How comfortable is your FarTwin with technical matters?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly proficient in using and understanding technical tools and software, often leveraging them to enhance their work.
Your FarTwin will have limited experience with technology and may struggle with technical tasks or feel uncomfortable navigating complex systems.

dimensions.label: Social Circle Size
dimensions.description: How many people does your FarTwin typically interact with?

options.description: Your FarTwin will have a large and diverse social circle, regularly engaging with numerous individuals from different backgrounds.
Your FarTwin will maintain a smaller, more intimate social circle, preferring closer relationships with a few key individuals.

dimensions.label: Data Analysis Preference
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prefer to work with data?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely heavily on visual representations of data, using charts and graphs to quickly grasp complex insights.
Your FarTwin will focus on numerical analysis and statistical methods, often prioritizing accuracy over intuitive understanding.

dimensions.label: Time Management Approach
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prioritize their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances and priorities, often being open to adjusting their schedule as needed.
Your FarTwin will maintain a strict routine and schedule, prioritizing efficiency and productivity above all else.

dimensions.label: Idea Generation Method
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin generate new ideas?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on their own thoughts and reflections to spark creativity, often taking time for self-reflection.
Your FarTwin will engage in open discussions with others, building upon the ideas and perspectives of those around them.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will primarily express themselves through visual art forms, such as drawing or graphic design.
Your FarTwin will focus on written communication, using language to convey their ideas and emotions.
